description.en:
"LooksRare is the community-first NFT marketplace that actively rewards collectors and creators for participating.

ğŸ–¼ğŸ‘Œ By NFT people, for NFT people.

This is who we are.

Part of being community-first means that LooksRare rewards, empowers, and gives back to the platform's users and creators.

ğŸ’ Get rewarded - Users that buy or sell NFTs from eligible collections earn LOOKS tokens.
ğŸ¤ Share the platform fees - 100% of trading fees are earned by LOOKS stakers.
âš¡ï¸ Creators get paid instantly - Creators get royalty payments at the moment of sale.

ğŸ´ Not a fork
LooksRareâ€™s smart contracts are custom-built within a modular system that enables new features to be rolled out over time â€“ without compromising security â€“ thanks to standardized signatures that clearly define the execution scope.

This means we can offer new types of interactions, like these (rolling out soon):

- Collection offer - Make an offer that covers all NFTs in a selected collection
- Trait offer - Offer to buy any NFT with a specific trait in a collection e.g. BAYC w/ Gold Fur
- Multi-cancelation - Cancels multiple open orders in one transaction

ğŸ¦– Not a dinosaur
From utilizing some of the worldâ€™s most powerful search infra, down to implementing on-chain standards like EIP-712 and EIP-2981, LooksRareâ€™s technical architecture (contracts, database, API, front end, search) has been designed from the floor up for scalability, speed and security using the latest and greatest tech.

Weâ€™ve also made sure to retain compatibility for deploying on ETH scaling solutions when they're ready for the masses."

LooksRareâ€™s smart contracts are custom-built within a modular system that enables new features to be rolled out over time â€“ without compromising security â€“ thanks to standardized signatures that clearly define the execution scope.

This means we can offer new types of interactions, like these (rolling out soon):

- Collection offer - Make an offer that covers all NFTs in a selected collection
- Trait offer - Offer to buy any NFT with a specific trait in a collection e.g. BAYC w/ Gold Fur
- Multi-cancelation - Cancels multiple open orders in one transaction

ğŸ¦– Not a dinosaur
From utilizing some of the worldâ€™s most powerful search infra, down to implementing on-chain standards like EIP-712 and EIP-2981, LooksRareâ€™s technical architecture (contracts, database, API, front end, search) has been designed from the floor up for scalability, speed and security using the latest and greatest tech.

Weâ€™ve also made sure to retain compatibility for deploying on ETH scaling solutions when they're ready for the masses."
